projects.title: Modern Admin Dashboard
projects.description: A modern, responsive Admin Dashboard built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. Features include dynamic charts using Recharts, toast notifications with Sonner, date handling via date-fns, and reusable UI components from Shadcn/UI. The project follows a mobile-first design and ensures fast performance with clean, modular code.

projects.title: E-learning Platform – React + TypeScript Frontend
projects.description: A modern and responsive E-learning platform built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The platform includes pages like Home, Courses, Categories, Instructors, Pricing, and Authentication (Signup & Login). It features reusable components, clean layouts, and a mobile-first approach. The project showcases my skills in front-end development, offering a seamless user experience with performance optimization.

projects.title: Responsive Hotel Booking App UI – React, TypeScript & Tailwind
projects.description: This is a modern, responsive hotel booking web application built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The platform features a clean and dynamic user interface with smooth animations powered by Framer Motion. Key components include a hotel search form, destination highlights, and detailed hotel cards. The UI is fully responsive and optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile. The project focuses on performance, interactivity, and a seamless user experience.
